headline: Controversy Surrounds Onana's Performance as Man Utd Keeper
description: Recent performances by Andr√© Onana have sparked debate among Manchester United fans and analysts regarding his status as one of the team's goalkeepers. Critics argue that his inconsistency and errors have cost the team crucial points in important matches. Supporters, however, highlight his potential for growth and remarkable reflexes, advocating for patience as he settles into the Premier League's competitive environment. This discussion has intensified online, with opinions divided over whether Onana ranks among the club's less effective keepers in recent history.
